Shadow_Ward.name: Shadow Ward
Shadow_Ward.description: Applies a ward to the caster and nearby allies, increasing their shadow resistance and magic defense.

ranks.description: Applies a ward to the caster and nearby allies, increasing their shadow resistance and magic defense.

Genesis.name: Genesis
Genesis.description: Applies a timed holy bomb to surrounding targets, dealing $DMG holy damage and decreasing their holy resistance.

ranks.description: Applies a timed holy bomb to surrounding targets, dealing $DMG holy damage and decreasing their holy resistance.

Healos.name: Healos
Healos.description: Casts a holy glyph, healing the caster and surrounding allies by $DMG and providing a heal over time condition to them.

ranks.description: Casts a holy glyph, healing the caster and surrounding allies by $DMG and providing a heal over time condition to them.

Fluxclaw.name: Fluxclaw
Fluxclaw.description: Invokes a short ranged arcane claw that slashes targets twice, dealing $DMG damage each slash.

ranks.description: Invokes a short ranged arcane claw that slashes targets twice, dealing $DMG damage each slash.

Nova.name: Nova
Nova.description: Emits a ring of magic energy around the caster, dealing $DMG damage. Provides knockback to hit targets. Can potentially apply a snare condition.

ranks.description: Emits a ring of magic energy around the caster, dealing $DMG damage. Provides knockback to hit targets. Can potentially apply a snare condition.

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.description: Grants a buff increasing skill casting speed and skill cooldown speed to the caster and nearby allies.

ranks.description: Grants a buff increasing skill casting speed and skill cooldown speed to the caster and nearby allies.

Fluxbolt.name: Fluxbolt
Fluxbolt.description: Casts a magic projectile that explodes on impact, multi hitting up to four times, dealing $DMG heavy damage each hit.

ranks.description: Casts a magic projectile that explodes on impact, multi hitting up to four times, dealing $DMG heavy damage each hit.

Manaflow.name: Manaflow
Manaflow.description: Increases mana regeneration speed by 36%.

ranks.description: Increases mana regeneration speed by 36%.

Chroma_Ray.name: Chroma Ray
Chroma_Ray.description: Casts a holy ray, healing allies it passes by and damaging targets continuously for $DMG holy damage on hit.

ranks.description: Casts a holy ray, healing allies it passes by and damaging targets continuously for $DMG holy damage on hit.

Blink.name: Blink
Blink.description: Unlocks the ability to quickly teleport from one point to another. Double tap $DASHINPUT to blink.

ranks.description: Unlocks the ability to quickly teleport from one point to another. Double tap $DASHINPUT to blink.

Ruin.name: Ruin
Ruin.description: Invokes a glyph that spawns a swirl of shadow magic, dealing $DMG shadow damage up to three hits to targets within the radius.

ranks.description: Invokes a glyph that spawns a swirl of shadow magic, dealing $DMG shadow damage up to three hits to targets within the radius.

Cross.name: Cross
Cross.description: Manifests a source of explosive arcane magic, dealing $DMG damage to afflicted targets. Applies an elemental condition.

ranks.description: Manifests a source of explosive arcane magic, dealing $DMG damage to afflicted targets. Applies an elemental condition.

Imbue.name: Imbue
Imbue.description: Imbues a mystical boon to the caster and nearby allies.

ranks.description: Imbues a mystical boon to the caster and nearby allies.

Restora.name: Restora
Restora.description: Restores nearby friendly targets and the caster's health by $DMG.

ranks.description: Restores nearby friendly targets and the caster's health by $DMG.

Prism.name: Prism
Prism.description: Forms a shield around the caster, absorbing damage.

ranks.description: Forms a shield around the caster, absorbing damage.

Fluxspear.name: Fluxspear
Fluxspear.description: Casts a short piercing arcane spear, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a snare condition to adjacent targets.

ranks.description: Casts a short piercing arcane spear, dealing $DMG damage. Applies a snare condition to adjacent targets.
